languages.text: {n}Абеляр снисходительно кивает головой.{/n} "Пыл свежего назначения. Многие командиры и руководители проходят через это. Поверьте, еще лет пять-десять, и вы убедитесь, что лично пытаться исправить каждую мелкую проблему — непродуктивно".

{n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр снисходительно кивает головой.{/n} "Пыл свежего назначения. Многие командиры и руководители проходят через это. Поверьте, еще лет пять-десять, и вы убедитесь, что лично пытаться исправить каждую мелкую проблему — непродуктивно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德带着克制的态度点了点头。{/n}“新官上任三把火，许多指挥官与领导人都有过这样的经历。等再过五年或十年之后，您会发现，打算亲自解决每个小问题的想法是不现实的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德带着克制的态度点了点头。{/n}“新官上任三把火，许多指挥官与领导人都有过这样的经历。等再过五年或十年之后，您会发现，打算亲自解决每个小问题的想法是不现实的。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard asiente con paciencia.{/n} «Ah, el fervor del nombramiento. Afecta a muchos comandantes y líderes. Dentro de cinco o diez años, ya verá que intentar resolver cada nimiedad personalmente es una forma muy poco eficaz de actuar».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard asiente con paciencia.{/n} «Ah, el fervor del nombramiento. Afecta a muchos comandantes y líderes. Dentro de cinco o diez años, ya verá que intentar resolver cada nimiedad personalmente es una forma muy poco eficaz de actuar».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは控えめに頷いた。{/n}「新しく任命された者の熱意。多くの司令官や指導者が経験することです。あと5年か10年待てば、どんな些細な問題でも自分で解決しようとするのは非効率だとわかるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは控えめに頷いた。{/n}「新しく任命された者の熱意。多くの司令官や指導者が経験することです。あと5年か10年待てば、どんな些細な問題でも自分で解決しようとするのは非効率だとわかるでしょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard nickt mit duldsamer Miene.{/n} "Der Eifer der eben erst Ernannten. Viele Kommandanten und Anführer erleben das. In fünf bis zehn Jahren werdet Ihr erkennen, dass es nicht sinnvoll ist, jedes kleine Problem selbst lösen zu wollen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard nickt mit duldsamer Miene.{/n} "Der Eifer der eben erst Ernannten. Viele Kommandanten und Anführer erleben das. In fünf bis zehn Jahren werdet Ihr erkennen, dass es nicht sinnvoll ist, jedes kleine Problem selbst lösen zu wollen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard acquiesce d'un air compréhensif.{/n} « Je reconnais bien là le zèle propre aux nouveaux commandants. Bon nombre de dirigeants en font l'expérience. Reparlons-en dans quelques années, et vous verrez qu'il ne sert à rien de vouloir résoudre le moindre problème par vous-même. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard acquiesce d'un air compréhensif.{/n} « Je reconnais bien là le zèle propre aux nouveaux commandants. Bon nombre de dirigeants en font l'expérience. Reparlons-en dans quelques années, et vous verrez qu'il ne sert à rien de vouloir résoudre le moindre problème par vous-même. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, huysuzca baş sallıyor.{/n} "Kanınız kaynıyordur, şüphesiz. Çok komutan ve lider aynı şeyi yaşamıştır. Beş, on yıl sonra her meseleyi bizzat çözmeye çalışmanın nafile olduğunu anlarsınız."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard nods with an air of forbearance.{/n} "The zeal of the newly appointed. Many commanders and leaders experience it. Wait another five or ten years and you will see that trying to solve every minor issue yourself is ineffectual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, huysuzca baş sallıyor.{/n} "Kanınız kaynıyordur, şüphesiz. Çok komutan ve lider aynı şeyi yaşamıştır. Beş, on yıl sonra her meseleyi bizzat çözmeye çalışmanın nafile olduğunu anlarsınız."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
